特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Various methods including, pair and group work, listening exercises, dialog construction and presentation.
Each class will consist of various speaking and listening skills, pair work and group activities. Creating and writing theme-based dialogs and presenting them will also be included.

第1回: Introduction, course overview, rules and advice, classroom interview chart, self-introductions
Review of class introduction and related questions.  One hour of out of class preparation
第2回: Text Unit 1 "Greetings"   first time meetings, key expressions, the handshake,
Summary worksheet of first meetings.  One hour of out of class study.
第3回: Text Unit 1 "Greetings" continued, listening comprehensions drills, extend the dialog exercises
Writing related dialogs of in-class study.  One hour of study.
第4回: Text Unit 2 "Likes and Dislikes"   Collecting Data chart, pair work gap exercise,
Pair dialog about likes and dislikes.  One hour or more of out of class study.
第5回: Text Unit 2 "Likes and Dislikes" continued, continue the sentence, commenting positively and negatively to suggestions
Research of examples of stating opinions.  One hour of study.
第6回: Text Unit 3 "Times and Dates"   simple present tense, listening comprehension exercises
Time schedule worksheet homework assignment.  One hour of out of class study.
第7回: Text Unit 3 "Times and Dates" continued, your schedule, pair work time exchange, key expressions
Begin presentation writing.  One hour or more of study.
第8回: Practical Situation Dialog Construction and presentations, topics to be announced
Critique of presentation worksheet.  45 minutes of study.
第9回: Text Unit 4 "About Yesterday"   past tense, writing: paragraph construction, exchange and edit
Review and opinion of the in-class study.  One hour of study.
第10回: Text Unit 5 "Family"   describing appearance and personality, pair work gap exercise, listening comprehension drills
Essay:  Family arrangements in a cultural context.  One hour or more of out of class study.
第11回: Text Unit 5 "Family" continued, extend the dialogs, making a family tree
Research:  Japan's declining population.  One hour of study.
第12回: Text Unit 6 "About Tomorrow"   future tense, going to plus verb, making probable predictions, dialog construction: future dreams
Preparing for the holiday.  Ideal vacations.  One hour of study.
第13回: Group activity interview chart, course review, exam explanation, question and answer session
Personal profile, interview questions.  One hour of study.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.
